cnr.name: cnr
cnr.label: Number of child, i.e. child is child with number
cnr.label_de: Kinder-Nummer, d h CAPI-Kind ist Kind mit Nummer

cedu9.name: cedu9
cedu9.label: Are you still attending school? (Qu. 2)
cedu9.label_de: Gehst du denn noch zur Schule? (Frage 2)

cedu1a.name: cedu1a
cedu1a.label: What kind of school do you go to? (Qu. 3)

labels: 9 Evening school, school leaving certificate for adults
labels_de: 52 Kooperative Gesamtschule, kein spezifischer Schulzweig angegeben

cedu2.name: cedu2
cedu2.label: What grade are you in? (Qu. 4)
cedu2.label_de: Und in welcher Klasse bist Du? (Frage 4)

cedu10.name: cedu10
cedu10.label: What school-leaving certificate did you obtain? (Qu. 5)

labels: 1 Left school without a school-leaving certificate
2 Lower level secondary school school-leaving certificate
4 Entrance certificate for universities of applied sciences or from higher-level vocational school
5 General or subject-specific university entrance qualification
labels_de: 1 Von der Schule abgegangen ohne Abschluss

cedu11.name: cedu11
cedu11.label: What was your final average grade when you graduated from school? (Qu. 6)
cedu11.label_de: Welche Durchschnittsnote hast Du bei Deinem Schulabschluss erreicht? (Frage 6)

labels_de: 9 In diesem Fach hatte ich keine Noten
9 In diesem Fach hatte ich keine Noten

cedu13i8.name: cedu13i8
cedu13i8.label: Internships, traineeship, etc. including unpaid work (Qu. 8)

cedu13i11.name: cedu13i11
cedu13i11.label: Maternity or paternity leave or other leave of absence for childcare (Qu. 8)

cedu13i12.name: cedu13i12
cedu13i12.label: Alternative civilian service, voluntary social service year (Qu. 8)

cedu6i1.name: cedu6i1
cedu6i1.label: Most of the kids in my class are nice and helpful (Qu. 9)
cedu6i1.label_de: Die meisten in meiner Klasse sind nett und hilfsbereit (Frage 9)

cedu6i2.name: cedu6i2
cedu6i2.label: Most of the kids in my class accept me as I am (Qu. 9)

cedu6i3.name: cedu6i3
cedu6i3.label: If someone in the class is feeling bad, then the others try to help (Qu. 9)

cedu6i4.name: cedu6i4
cedu6i4.label: Everyone in my class likes to be with each other (Qu. 9)

cinc25i1.name: cinc25i1
cinc25i1.label: We have enough money for everything we need (Qu. 10)

cinc25i2.name: cinc25i2
cinc25i2.label: We must often do without something because we have to watch our budget (Qu. 10)

cinc25i3.name: cinc25i3
cinc25i3.label: In my family we usually do not have enough money. (Qu. 10)
cinc25i3.label_de: In meiner Familie ist das Geld meistens knapp (Frage 10)

chlt0a.name: chlt0a
chlt0a.label: How would you describe your health, generally speaking? (Qu. 11)

cedu7i1.name: cedu7i1
cedu7i1.label: I would rather be alone than with others.(Qu. 12)
cedu7i1.label_de: Ich bin lieber alleine als mit anderen zusammen (Frage 12)

cedu7i3.name: cedu7i3
cedu7i3.label: It is easy for me to find new friends (Qu. 12)

cedu7i5.name: cedu7i5
cedu7i5.label: Often, others don`t let me do things with them (Qu. 12)
cedu7i5.label_de: Die anderen lassen mich oft nicht mitmachen (Frage 12)

cedu7i6.name: cedu7i6
cedu7i6.label: Often, others don`t pay attention to me (Qu. 12)

cbf1i1.name: cbf1i1
cbf1i1.label: Best friend: How often do you talk about your concerns with him/her? (Qu. 14)

cbf1i2.name: cbf1i2
cbf1i2.label: Best friend: How often do you spend free time with him/her? (Qu. 14)

cbf1i3.name: cbf1i3
cbf1i3.label: Best friend: How often do you share your thoughts with him/her (Qu. 14)

cbf1i4.name: cbf1i4
cbf1i4.label: Best friend: How often do you do fun things together? (Qu. 14)

cbf0.name: cbf0
cbf0.label: Respondent indicates that he/she has no friend.(Qu. 13)

cpcr1.name: cpcr1
cpcr1.label: You live here with [all persons in household]. Is that correct? (Qu. 15)
cpcr1.label_de: Du lebst hier mit [alle Personen im gleichen Haushalt]. Richtig? (Frage 15)

cpcr5.name: cpcr5
cpcr5.label: Anonymized: Name anchor's partner in household (Qu. 19)

cpcr6i1.name: cpcr6i1
cpcr6i1.label: [Name anchor] shows you that she/he likes you (Qu. 20)
cpcr6i1.label_de: [Anker] zeigt Dir, dass er/sie Dich gerne hat (Frage 20)

cpcr6i3.name: cpcr6i3
cpcr6i3.label: [Name anchor] tries to cheer you up when you are sad (Qu. 20)

cpcr6i5.name: cpcr6i5
cpcr6i5.label: [Name anchor] knows who you are with when you go out (Qu. 20)

cpcr6i7.name: cpcr6i7
cpcr6i7.label: [Name anchor] knows where you are when you go out (Qu. 20)

cpcr10i1.name: cpcr10i1
cpcr10i1.label: When disappoint [name anchor] you afraid he/she love you less (Qu. 21)

cpcr10i2.name: cpcr10i2
cpcr10i2.label: You afraid of doing sth. wrong & disappointing [name anchor] (Qu. 21)

cpcr10i3.name: cpcr10i3
cpcr10i3.label: When made a mistake you wonder if [name anchor] likes you (Qu. 21)
cpcr10i3.label_de: Wenn Fehler gemacht, fragst, ob [Anker] Dich mag (Frage 21)

cpcr7i1.name: cpcr7i1
cpcr7i1.label: You tell [name anchor] what you`re thinking (Qu. 22)

cpcr7i2.name: cpcr7i2
cpcr7i2.label: [Name anchor] shows recognition for the things you do (Qu. 22)
cpcr7i2.label_de: Die Dinge, die Du tust, werden von [Anker] anerkannt (Frage 22)

cpcr7i4.name: cpcr7i4
cpcr7i4.label: You are annoyed or angry with each other (Qu. 22)

cpcr7i5.name: cpcr7i5
cpcr7i5.label: [Name anchor] shows you that he/she respects and likes you.(Qu. 22)
cpcr7i5.label_de: [Anker] zeigt Dir, dass er/sie Dich gut findet (Frage 22)

cpcr7i6.name: cpcr7i6
cpcr7i6.label: You disagree and quarrel (Qu. 22)
cpcr7i6.label_de: Ihr seid unterschiedlicher Meinung und streitet euch (Frage 22)

cpcr7i8.name: cpcr7i8
cpcr7i8.label: You share your secrets & private feelings with [name anchor] (Qu. 22)

cpcr11i1.label: When disappoint [name anchor`s partner] you afraid he/she love you less (Qu. 23)

cpcr11i3.name: cpcr11i3

cpcr11i3.label_de: Wenn Fehler gemacht, fragst, ob [Partner d. Ankers] Dich mag (Frage 23)

cpcr8i1.name: cpcr8i1
cpcr8i1.label: You tell [name anchor`s partner] what you`re thinking (Qu. 24)

cpcr9i1.label_de: [Partner d. Ankers] zeigt Dir, dass er/sie Dich gerne hat (Frage 25)

cpcr12.label_de: Hast Du leiblichen Vater/ Mutter, der/die nicht hier mit Dir lebt? (Frage 26)

cpcr13.name: cpcr13
cpcr13.label: Anonymized: Name biological parent outside the household (Qu. 27)

cpcr14.name: cpcr14
cpcr14.label: How often do you see [other parent] for visits or to meet somewhere? (Qu. 28)
cpcr14.label_de: Wie oft siehst Du [anderen Elternteil extern]? (Frage 28)

cpcr15.name: cpcr15
cpcr15.label: How often other kinds of contact with[other parent]? (Qu. 29)

cpcr17i1.name: cpcr17i1
cpcr17i1.label: When disappoint [other parent] you afraid he/she love you less (Qu. 30)

cpcr17i2.label: You afraid of doing sth. wrong & disappointing [other parent] (Qu. 30)

cpcr17i3.name: cpcr17i3
cpcr17i3.label: When made a mistake you wonder if [other parent] likes you (Qu. 30)
cpcr17i3.label_de: Wenn Fehler gemacht, fragst, ob [anderer Elternteil ext.] Dich mag (Frage 30)

cpcr16i2.name: cpcr16i2
cpcr16i2.label: [Other parent] shows recognition for the things you do (Qu. 31)
cpcr16i2.label_de: Dinge, die Du tust, werden von [anderer Elternteil ext.] anerkannt (Frage 31)

cpcr16i4.name: cpcr16i4
cpcr16i4.label: You are annoyed or angry with each other (Qu. 31)

cpcr16i5.name: cpcr16i5
cpcr16i5.label: [Other parent] shows you that he/she respects and likes you (Qu. 31)
cpcr16i5.label_de: [Anderer Elternteil ext.] zeigt Dir, dass er/sie Dich gut findet (Frage 31)

cpcr16i6.name: cpcr16i6
cpcr16i6.label: You disagree and quarrel (Qu. 31)
cpcr16i6.label_de: Ihr seid unterschiedlicher Meinung und streitet euch (Frage 31)

cpcr16i8.name: cpcr16i8
cpcr16i8.label: You share your secrets & private feelings with [other parent] (Qu. 31)

cpcr18i1.name: cpcr18i1
cpcr18i1.label: [Other parent] shows you that he/she likes you (Qu. 32)
cpcr18i1.label_de: [Anderer Elternteil ext.] zeigt Dir, dass er/sie Dich gerne hat (Frage 32)

cpcr18i3.name: cpcr18i3
cpcr18i3.label: [Other parent] tries to cheer you up when you are sad.(Qu. 32)

cpcr18i4.name: cpcr18i4
cpcr18i4.label: [Other parent] punishes you when you do something against his/her will (Qu. 32)
cpcr18i4.label_de: [Anderer Elternteil ext.] bestraft Dich, wenn Du gegen Willen tust (Frage 32)

cpcr18i6.name: cpcr18i6
cpcr18i6.label: NA
cpcr18i6.label_de: [Anderer Elternteil ext.] meint, immer Recht & Du nicht widersprechen (Frage 32)

cpcr18i8.name: cpcr18i8
cpcr18i8.label: [Other parent] never allows exceptions to his/her rules (Qu. 32)

clsr1i3.name: clsr1i3
clsr1i3.label: Free time activity: Meet with friends (Qu. 33)

clsr1i9.name: clsr1i9
clsr1i9.label: Free time activity: Do things with the family (Qu. 33)

clsr1i15.name: clsr1i15
clsr1i15.label: Free time activity: Do things by yourself (Qu. 33)

csdq1i1.name: csdq1i1
csdq1i1.label: SDQ: I try to be nice to other people. I care about their feelings (Qu. 34)

csdq1i3.name: csdq1i3
csdq1i3.label: SDQ: I get a lot of headaches, stomach-aches or sickness (Qu. 34)

csdq1i4.name: csdq1i4
csdq1i4.label: SDQ: I usually share with others (for example, candy, games, markers).(Qu. 34)

csdq1i5.name: csdq1i5
csdq1i5.label: SDQ: I get very angry and often lose my temper (Qu. 34)

csdq1i7.name: csdq1i7
csdq1i7.label: SDQ: I usually do as I am told (Qu. 34)
csdq1i7.label_de: SDQ: Normalerweise tue ich, was man mir sagt (Frage 34)

csdq1i9.name: csdq1i9
csdq1i9.label: SDQ: I am helpful if someone is hurt, upset or feeling ill (Qu. 34)
csdq1i9.label_de: SDQ: Ich bin hilfsbereit, wenn andere verletzt oder traurig sind (Frage 34)

csdq1i12.name: csdq1i12
csdq1i12.label: SDQ: I fight a lot. I can make other people do what I want (Qu. 34)

csdq1i13.name: csdq1i13
csdq1i13.label: SDQ: I am often unhappy, depressed or tearful (Qu. 34)

csdq1i16.name: csdq1i16
csdq1i16.label: SDQ: I am nervous in new situations. I easily lose confidence (Qu. 34)

csdq1i17.name: csdq1i17
csdq1i17.label: SDQ: I am kind to younger children (Qu. 34)

csdq1i18.name: csdq1i18
csdq1i18.label: SDQ: I am often accused of lying or cheating.(Qu. 34)

csdq1i20.name: csdq1i20
csdq1i20.label: SDQ: I often offer to help others (parents, teachers, children) (Qu. 34)
csdq1i20.label_de: SDQ: Helfe anderen oft freiwillig (Eltern, Lehrern o. Gleichaltrigen) (Frage 34)

csdq1i22.name: csdq1i22
csdq1i22.label: SDQ: I take things that are not mine (from home, school or elsewhere) (Qu. 34)

csdq1i24.name: csdq1i24
csdq1i24.label: SDQ: I have many fears, I am easily scared.(Qu. 34)
